message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $14,000. I believe in its value, but I want to give you the first opportunity to own it.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $10,000 is too low. How about $12,500?  That's a fair compromise.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still feel that $10,000 is a fair price for the product. I hope we can reach a mutually agreeable solution.
